meanings.definition: To distribute or apportion for a specific purpose.
meanings.sent1: The teacher allocates different tasks to each student in the group project.
meanings.sent2: The company allocates funds for research and development every quarter.
meanings.sent3: The chef allocates ingredients for the special dish, but accidentally adds too much salt.
meanings.sent4: The captain allocates roles to the crew members, turning the ship into a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The mayor allocates resources to improve the city's infrastructure, ensuring a better quality of life for residents.

meanings.definition: To set aside or designate for a particular use.
meanings.sent1: She allocates a portion of her salary for savings every month.
meanings.sent2: The library allocates a section for new releases to make them easily accessible.
meanings.sent3: The gardener allocates a corner of the garden for growing exotic plants, creating a mini jungle.
meanings.sent4: The architect allocates space for a rooftop garden, bringing nature into the urban environment.
meanings.sent5: The student allocates time for studying each day, ensuring academic success.
